title: Why is Rammus all of the sudden so good?
body: His win rate is something ridiculous like 55%, but he hasn't been changed recently, so why is he doing so well?

replies.body: A bug that gave him some huge buff
Specifically his taunt lasting much longer than intended.
didn't pay much attention to the rioter talking about it, thanks for sharing more information
Because one the taunt bug. Also with ADC's being so dominant lately it's like Rammus is a kid in a candy store.
He's been good for a long time. He just comes and goes into fashion depending on the meta. The only time he isn't take is when there is a more meta champ.
All of a sudden? He's always been good. This happens every now and then even without any changes.
